channel.title: Legal Client
channel.description:
Occasionally people have rewritten servers from scratch, but has anyone rewritten a client from scratch? That would be amazing if someone redesigned the world, had different looking NPCs, different weapons & armour, etc. Plus it would be legal to use that client! If you know anyone is working on this or has done this, please send me a link to their thread. I would love to view their progress and possibly continue the project.
TheCyberMan

item.title: Legal Client
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Then you have your own game. Ta-da!

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Client
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

You’d have to change every sprite/model, possibly the way the filesystem functions, the protocol, etc. You’d essentially be starting completely from scratch.

Read full topic
